memberdef.name: MF_EMPTY_ENTITY_MSG
memberdef.initializer: MERCURY_HANDLED_PREFIXED_EMPTY_MESSAGE( NAME, EntityID, \ CellEntityMessageHandler< void >, \ std::make_pair( &Entity::NAME, IS_REAL_ONLY ) )

memberdef.name: MF_BEGIN_ENTITY_MSG
memberdef.initializer: BEGIN_HANDLED_PREFIXED_MESSAGE( NAME, EntityID, \ CellEntityMessageHandler< CellAppInterface::NAME##Args >, \ std::make_pair( &Entity::NAME, IS_REAL_ONLY ) )

memberdef.name: MF_BEGIN_ENTITY_MSG_WITH_FAILURE
memberdef.initializer: BEGIN_HANDLED_PREFIXED_MESSAGE( NAME, EntityID, \ CellEntityMessageHandlerWithFailure< CellAppInterface::NAME##Args >,\ std::make_pair( &CellApp::FAILURE_HANDLER, \ std::make_pair( &Entity::NAME, IS_REAL_ONLY ) ) )
